summary: The module defines a set of generator utilities that translate pulse frameâ€‘change instructions into visual drawing primitives. Each generator receives a formatted PulseInstruction together with style and device configuration, and produces elementary drawing objects that depict frequency and phase adjustments in Qiskit pulse diagrams.
business_intent: Enable clear, customizable visualizations of quantum pulse frame changes (frequency and phase shifts) to aid users in analyzing and debugging pulse schedules within the Qiskit ecosystem.
